title: MICE MEDIA: Lessons in Internet Literacy
overview: A family of mice navigate the treacherous world of online information in MICE MEDIA: Lessons in Internet Literacy. The father can't help but believe information he finds on his smartphone, and each time, his daughter must step in and teach him about the traps of the internet and social media. This five-minute educational comedy helps viewers learn the essentials of internet literacy through a quirky and lovable father-daughter duo.
